dcterms:creator: David
Max
dcterms:description: A dataset containing subscription data for customers, including information such as services enabled and platform settings, collected monthly over the past two years.
dcterms:title: Churn Prediction Subscription Data

dcterms:creator: Max
dcterms:description: A dataset containing action data on customer interactions, collected daily but not archived, which includes information on modules accessed and timestamps.
dcterms:title: Churn Prediction Action Data

dcterms:creator: Ray
dcterms:description: A dataset containing leads for special financing loans, including demographics, address, mortgage, salary, and employment status, used to predict financing approval.
dcterms:title: Special Financing Leads Data
